Image credit: Bruce Taylor Sunway Botswana Moremi Cronje Rademan MG. Sunway Botswana Moremi. Image credit: Bruce Taylor Africa Botswana Wild Parks Accommodated Safari 13 Nights • Sightseeing • Safari Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Experience the very best of Botswana on this 14-day small group safari. Explore the Okavango Delta by traditional dug-out canoe and on foot, enjoy outstanding game drives in open 4WD vehicles through Moremi Game Reserve, a private concession, and Chobe National Park. Visit the Khama Rhino Sanctuary, discover the vast Makgadikgadi Salt Pans, and end your journey at the spectacular Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe. Sunway Safari is 100% African owned and operated and has been hosting travellers on incredible adventures throughout Southern Africa since 1994. View more View less 13 nights + safari & sightseeing from $ 6580 per person share twin +US$300 local payment. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 01 Nov 26 or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 1 night accommodation in chalets at Khama Rhino Sanctuary where two rooms share a bathroom. 10 nights’ accommodation in chalets, lodges and permanent tented camps all with ensuite facilities 2 nights’ serviced camping in the Okavango Delta. Each tent has an ensuite chemical toilet, twin camp beds with linen. Shared shower tent with water heated on the campfire 13 breakfasts, 11 lunches & 7 dinners Game drive in the main tour vehicle in Khama Rhino Sanctuary Game drives in an open 4WD as per the itinerary in Moremi Game Reserve and Chobe National Park Mekoro trails and walks with local guides in the Okavango Delta as per the itinerary Makgadikgadi Pans visit Wildlife cruise on the Chobe River Walking tour of Victoria Falls All other transport as per the itinerary accompanied by two professional safari guides Price from From $6580 per person twin share + US$300 local payment Single supplement if unwilling to room share with another same-gender single traveller $1450 Travel: 01 Jan-31 Dec 26 NOTE: You can join this tour on day 2 in Maun to avoid the two longer travel days from Johannesburg to Maun for NZD6,370 per person twin share + US$300 local payment Tour Code: BTa13 Scheduled departure dates with a maximum group size of 12 people. There is an option to start this tour on day 2 in Maun. Selected dates can be combined with a 15 day safari tour through Namibia. Departure Dates NOTE: Extend your safari & save! NBa denotes you can add a 15 day Namibia safari to this departure date to create an extended safari that includes all the highlights of Namibia. NOTE: ZMa denotes that can add a 16 day Zambia and Malawi Safari. You will receive a 5% repeat traveller discount on your second safari. Ask your House of Travel consultant for more information Departs Johannesburg Sunday 06:30am / Ends Victoria Falls 08.30am Travel dates 2026: 12-25 Apr, 26 Apr-09 May, 24 May-06 Jun, 21 Jun-04 Jul NBa, 28 Jun-11 Jul NBa, 05-18 Jul NBa, 12-25 Jul NBa, 26 Jul-08 Aug NBa, 02-15 Aug NBa, 16-29 Aug NBa, 23 Aug-05 Sep NBa, 06-19 Sep NBa, 13-26 Sep NBa, 27 Sep-10 Oct NBa, 04-17 Oct NBa, 18-31 Oct NBa, 25 Oct-07 Nov NBa, 08-21 Nov, 15-28 Nov & 22 Nov-05 Dec 26 NBa NOTE: The following dates are available, however are not guaranteed departures until 4 people are booked - talk to your House of Travel Consultant for current availability 01-14 Mar 26 NBa, 15-28 Mar 26 NBa, 22 Mar-04 Apr 26, 29 Mar-11 Apr 26, 05-18 Apr 26, 03-16 May 26 NBa, 10-23 May 26, 31 May-13 Jun 26 NBa, 07-20 Jun 26 NBa, 14-27 Jun 26 NBa, 06-19 Dec 26 NBa, 20 Dec 26-02 Jan 27 2025 Departures: There is very limited availability on some 2025 departures, enquire with your House of Travel consultant for pricing and departure dates. Itinerary Day 1: Johannesburg - Khama Rhino Sanctuary Depart Johannesburg at 6.30am. Head north and cross the border into Botswana. Game drive in Khama Rhino Sanctuary and overnight. Day 2: Maun Drive through the Kalahari to Maun and the gateway to the Okavango Delta by late afternoon. There is the option to join the tour today and skip two long driving days by flying into Maun airport. Day 3-4: Okavango Delta Two nights wild camping in the Okavango Delta at our serviced tented camp that we will reach by local mokoro (dug out) canoe. Explore by mekoro and on foot with our local poler guides as we explore their ‘big backyard.’ Day 5-8: Moremi Game Reserve We drive by 4WD to our bush lodge which sits on a private concession in the wilderness bordering Moremi Game Reserve for a 3-night stay. Spend your days on open 4WD game drives in the private concession and Moremi which are arguably two of the best game viewing destinations in Southern Africa. We return to our lodge in Maun at approx. midday on Day 7. Day 9: Makgadikgadi Pans There is time for an optional game flight over the Okavango Delta this morning (own expense) before we drive to Nata. From here we will explore the shimmering salt pans of Makgadikgadi. Day 10-11: Chobe National Park We head to the northern reaches of Chobe National Park to our lodge located in Kasane on the banks of the Chobe River. There will be an early morning game drive and afternoon cruise on the river in a small game viewing boat. You are assured of some up-close sightings of the wildlife in and around the river. Day 12-13: Victoria Falls Leave Botswana and cross into Zimbabwe to Victoria Falls. The mighty Zambezi River thunders 100m over the gorge creating a magnificent spectacle. Explore Victoria Falls on foot with a local guide. There is a free day to make the most of the many adventure activities available in and around the Falls. Day 14: Depart Your safari ends this morning. Airport transfers are available. On selected dates there is an option to join a 15 day safari through Namibia or a 16 day safari through Zambia & Malawi. Please ask your consultant for more details. Terms & Conditions Valid for bookings until further notice or sold out. • Flights are additional • A 20% deposit is required at the time of booking • Minimum age is 12 years. Travellers who will be over 65 years at the time of travel need to supply a medical declaration. • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
